H8643.def: = loud sound ◄ produced either by the human voice or by musical instruments ► used to express an emotion or to communicate something to a community

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H410.def: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H4714.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}; ► regarded as founder of the {L:Egyptian<SDBH:מִצְרִי>} nation

H7214.def: exact meaning unsure; probably: = a wild, untamable animal with horns, and very strong; perhaps wild ox, buffalo, or rhinoceros; ≈ symbol of strength, wildness, and power

H5173.def: = any action which attempts to interpret an event or a natural occurrence or a sign ► to predict an outcome or the will of a deity

H3290.def: = man, also known as {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}; ◄ second son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}; ► one of the patriarchs of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel

H7081.def: = action by which humans communicate with the spirit world using a variety of means such as inspecting the liver of animals, shaking arrows, consulting teraphim, or casting lots; ≈ usually regarded as an evil practice that is to be condemned; responsibility of a prophet or king

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H6256.def: = a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H4100.def: = a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

H410.def: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H6466.def: = action by which a person or deity carries out some purposeful activity, in order to create something or cause something to happen

H5375.def: = process by which an object increases in height

H7901.def: = state or action by which a human being or animal is in or assumes a horizontal position; ► in order to rest, sleep, or have sex with someone, or because of being unable to stand up as a result of weakness or death; ≈ sometimes associated with security

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H2964.def: literally: what is torn apart; hence: = slain victim of a carnivorous animal; ≈ associated with a violent death, bloodshed, and frequently used as a metaphor for victims of warfare

H1818.def: = red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of {L:life<SDBH:נֶפֶשׁ>}; human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land

H2491.def: = state in which humans or animal are fatally wounded with a sharp object

H1111.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Zippor<SDBH:צִפֹּור>}; ► king of {L:Moab<SDBH:מֹואָב>}; tried to curse and destroy the Israelites on their way to {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H1109.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Beor<SDBH:בְּעֹור>}, from {L:Pethor<SDBH:פְּתֹור>}; ► a non-Israelite prophet or fortune-teller; ≈ the name became a symbol for attempts to deviate Israel from its divinely chosen path

H1571.def: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

H6895.def: = causative action by which humans or deities consign humans to death, usually by invoking the name of a deity if the agent is human; ◄ this is done as punishment, out of contempt, fear, anger, or hostility, or because one was paid to do so; ► the effectiveness of a curse partially depends on the authority of the one pronouncing it

H1288.def: = causative action by which humans cause animals to fall on their knees

H1109.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Beor<SDBH:בְּעֹור>}, from {L:Pethor<SDBH:פְּתֹור>}; ► a non-Israelite prophet or fortune-teller; ≈ the name became a symbol for attempts to deviate Israel from its divinely chosen path

H6030.def: = action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions

H1111.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Zippor<SDBH:צִפֹּור>}; ► king of {L:Moab<SDBH:מֹואָב>}; tried to curse and destroy the Israelites on their way to {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H312.def: = pertaining to being different from other objects and events that are in the same range

H4725.def: = a specific area or point in space

H194.def: = marker indicating that the information that follows is possibly true but that there is no complete certainty

H3474.def: = causative action by which humans or deities cause objects to be without curve or bend and/or have an even or regular surface

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H6895.def: = causative action by which humans or deities consign humans to death, usually by invoking the name of a deity if the agent is human; ◄ this is done as punishment, out of contempt, fear, anger, or hostility, or because one was paid to do so; ► the effectiveness of a curse partially depends on the authority of the one pronouncing it

26.gl: to be straight in the eyes (of someone) > to be accepted

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H6465.def: = mountain; ◄ located in {L:Moab<SDBH:מֹואָב>}; ► where {L:Balaam<SDBH:בִּלְעָם>} tried to curse {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} and where Israelites were involved in idolatry

H3452.def: = area without water and therefore without vegetation and settlers; sometimes taken as the name of one specific region

H1109.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Beor<SDBH:בְּעֹור>}, from {L:Pethor<SDBH:פְּתֹור>}; ► a non-Israelite prophet or fortune-teller; ≈ the name became a symbol for attempts to deviate Israel from its divinely chosen path

H1129.def: = causative action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

H7651.def: = state in which a countable entity is seven in number

H4196.def: = construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices

H3559.def: = state in which an object is firmly and immovably located in a certain place

H6499.def: = young male bovine; ► clean, used as sacrifice; ≈ associated with power and strength, but also with violence and aggression and therefore often used to denote people who behave as such

H352.def: = male herbivorous mammal with four legs; ◄ |iovis ladicaudata|i*, fat-tailed sheep; ► clean animal, used for sacrifice, source of meat, hides, wool, and horns; ≈ associated with strength and leadership
